comments:
The build I use is: 3.1.0 Build id: I20050627-1435.

1. Create a new Java project jp1 and switch to Java perspective.
2. Create a package p1 under jp1.
3. Create a new class C1 under p1.
4. Dirty the C1.java file by entering some comments.
5. Without saving C1.java, in Package Explorer, delete jp1.
6. In the Confirm Project Delete dialog, choose "Also delete contents 
under '[Your workspace path]\jp1', and click Yes.

The following exception was thrown and uncaught:
Java Model Exception: Java Model Status [jp1 does not exist]
